duties_responsibilities.duty: Work within the payroll processing and accounting teams to assist with implementation of new contractual pay changes and initiatives
Coordinate and effectively communicate with multiple departments
Create new process documents or update existing documents as necessary
Recommend and assist in process improvements to improve the control environment and increase the utilization of resources
Represent the department in meetings and through written and verbal communication with internal and external customers
Perform analyses to evaluate the impact of the contractual changes

education_certification.credential: Bachelor's Degree in Accounting, Finance, Business Administration, or equivalent education/experience
